title: Language Education Competency Enhancement Through Customized Bimodal MOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational language learning skills
context.additional_context: Intensive online course for novice professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen language competencies. Digital devices are provided, combining personalized dual-layer MOOC design with individualized learning paths and real-time interaction

learning_goals: Using a personalized dual-layer MOOC structure, learners can achieve over 80% of self-directed language learning goals within 10 hours per week
Through real-time online sessions, learners demonstrate over 90% participation in collaborative activities with peers and instructors
Learners score over 75 points (out of 100) on assignments evaluating language application skills in summative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
